name: The maximum credit card limit depends on the customer's salary

testSteps.description: The maximum credit card limit depends on the customer's salary #1: {Salary=£5000, Approved or Refused=Refused, Max Limit=0, Notes=Salary must be over £10,000}

children.description: Given an individual customer with an account
Given an individual customer with an annual salary of £5000
When the customer applies for a credit card
Then the credit card application should be Refused
And if approved, the maximum credit limit should be 0

testSteps.description: The maximum credit card limit depends on the customer's salary #2: {Salary=£15,000, Approved or Refused=Approved, Max Limit=£2500, Notes=Up to £15,000}

children.description: Given an individual customer with an account
Given an individual customer with an annual salary of £15,000
When the customer applies for a credit card
Then the credit card application should be Approved
And if approved, the maximum credit limit should be £2500

testSteps.description: The maximum credit card limit depends on the customer's salary #3: {Salary=£25,000, Approved or Refused=Approved, Max Limit=£5000, Notes=Over £15,000}

children.description: Given an individual customer with an account
Given an individual customer with an annual salary of £25,000
When the customer applies for a credit card
Then the credit card application should be Approved
And if approved, the maximum credit limit should be £5000

testSteps.description: The maximum credit card limit depends on the customer's salary #4: {Salary=£100,000, Approved or Refused=Approved, Max Limit=£5000, Notes=£5000 is the max limit}

children.description: Given an individual customer with an account
Given an individual customer with an annual salary of £100,000
When the customer applies for a credit card
Then the credit card application should be Approved
And if approved, the maximum credit limit should be £5000

userStory.narrative:
In order to ensure that credit cards are not given to customers who will be unable to repay them
As a financial institution
I want to ensure that only clients with sufficient annual income are provided with a credit card

title: The maximum credit card limit depends on the customer's salary
description:
A customer needs a salary of at least £10,000. There are two types of card,
one with a limit of £2500, and another with a limit of £5000

tags.name: Applying for a credit card/Credit card financial checks

dataSetDescriptors.name: Credit card approval for different salary levels
